scripts.restart: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.chrome:version: docker run -it --rm --cap-add=SYS_ADMIN lighthouse_docker https://example.com --fast --quiet --output=json | node -e "let f = ''; process.stdin.on('data', d => f += d); process.stdin.on('close', () => console.log(JSON.parse(f).userAgent));"
